name: Boxing Gym Tycoon-Idle Game
description:
Fun and free tycoon strategy and resource management simulator game! Create your own boxing empire.
Ever wish you could own a gym? Start to share the satisfaction of training champion
Build and manage your first dream gym.
Invest wisely with different growth strategy. Allocate your money in boxing equipment, staff management and attract elite boxing starts to make your gym more famous.
Explore various cities all around the world to build your unique gym empire! Make your customers enjoy all kinds of workout equipment and routines. Start the business from scratch, manage it strategically to make it thrive continuously and become a gym tycoon as you wish.
Features:
• User-friendly interface.
• Realistic simulation of the gym scene.
• Stunning 3D graphics and smooth gameplay.
• Multiple choices of facilities, equipment, services and growth strategy.
• Enjoyable exploration of your own gym business and different rewards and achievements.
• Get idle money and become the best gym tycoon in the world, even when you're offline.
